column4: hi all! i'm using natty netbook edition, and it randomly crashes. screen is black, can#t change to vt, no ping, no ssh. there's nothing obvious in the syslog. i wonder how to debug this...
anything i could turn on to find out what's happening?
while its running  ssh in, and have the log files being printed in real time.. untill it crashes. (use tail -f /var/log/SOMTHING)    and see what the logs say.
as i said, the syslog doesn't have anything interesting...
